channel.title: Vulnhub on The Index
channel.description: Recent content in Vulnhub on The Index

item.title: Golden Eyes
item.description: If you want to follow along here’s the link for it : VulnHub Alright back again, this time is about Mailing stuffs hurray! First we need to enumerate the basics, netdiscover and nmap we gonna use full port scan for this one If we inspect the index to see the terminal.js, then we have if it’s decoded into HTML entity (you can use CyberChef) then it would be InvincibleHack3r it is valid for boris

item.title: Coffee Addicts : Write Up
item.description: The challenge is based on : https://www.vulnhub.com/entry/coffee-addicts-1,699/ another vulnhub boot2root machine, well let’s get started! first of all let’s use netdiscover to see where the machine is. $ sudo netdiscover i retrieved the machine as 192.168.3.16, now let’s enumerate it with nmap. $ nmap 192.168.3.16 -A Now we get 80 and 22 which means it has a website and an SSH open for us, let’s check the website 192.168.3.16:80 it prompts us to add coddeeaddicts.
